title: Pixel 3XL Screen issues NETFLIX HDR
content:
Hello Pixel community

I've bought a used Pixel 3 XL in a great condition and i'm loving it , untill i played an HDR episode on Netflix and i saw some vertical distorted lines running in the screen , and this still occur even when i close the app , first i was nervous , but i tried to play my Netflix account on my friend 3XL and the same issues happened after many attempts , it doesn't happen all the time i play an HDR title , but it does once in a while , and i can't be happy with my first Pixel because of that . it was a very big investment (worth two month of my country monthly salary), by the way this doesn't when i play an HDR video on Youtube.


Device is up to date.


I need your help guys !
